3.0.name: wordpress/list-draft-posts
3.0.description:
I am no longer developing or supporting this plugin. My more recent List Drafts Widget does much the same thing in widget form, and is still supported.

List Draft Posts is a simple plugin which outputs a list of the titles of all posts currently saved as drafts. An options page allows configuration of the output. Its default options will put everything in an unordered list item, the heading in <h2> tags, and the list of posts as an unordered list.

The options page allows the user to change the markup used to suit other layouts, and to change the heading and the text used to describe posts saved without a title.

When deactivated, the plugin will clear its options.

Typical use would be in your sidebar, where you can now have a list of forthcoming items as a "teaser" for your readers, or as a reminder to authors that they really need to finish those posts they started. It will
